sdk3_best_practices.practice: Always use numeric cluster IDs (not CLUSTER constants)

sdk3_best_practices.practice: Configure attribute reporting with optimal intervals

sdk3_best_practices.practice: Always add .catch() to promises in onNodeInit

sdk3_best_practices.practice: Set getOnStart: true for immediate initial values
sdk3_best_practices.reason: Shows data immediately after pairing, not after first report
